bibl.title: Osiris-Smithis in Egyptian Anthroponyms.
bibl.note: The element Osiris-Smithis in personal names. - Geographical spread. - The Chronological evolution. - The name T3-šr.t p3-dỉ-Wsỉr-ns-p3-mtr / Σενπετορζμηθις. - Comparative material: Khnum's sacred staff in personal names. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Gwen Jennes, Osiris-Smithis in Egyptian Anthroponyms.

The element Osiris-Smithis in personal names. - Geographical spread. - The Chronological evolution. - The name T3-šr.t p3-dỉ-Wsỉr-ns-p3-mtr / Σενπετορζμηθις. - Comparative material: Khnum's sacred staff in personal names. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
